section.name: News Archive
section.p: Here is an overview of all Wicket related news items posted on our front page .

subsection.name: May 4, 2005 - Eclipse Live Demo added
subsection.p: Using Wink we have put together a live Eclipse Demo showing how to get started developing your first Wicket application.

subsection.name: April 18, 2005 - Netbeans guide added
subsection.p: Finally we have a Netbeans guide for running the kick start project in Netbeans.

subsection.name: April 15, 2005 - QuickStart has moved
subsection.p: The project formerly known as 'Wicket QuickStart' has moved into the Wicket Stuff project and has been renamed to 'Wicket Kick Start'.
